  • Constructor Details

    • SimulationFacade

      public SimulationFacade(Bridge bridge, CSumo sumoConfiguration)
      Creates a new SimulationFacade object.
      Parameters:
      bridge - Connection to Traci.
      sumoConfiguration - The SUMO configuration file.

  • Method Details

    • getDepartedVehicles

      public final List<String> getDepartedVehicles() throws InternalFederateException
      Returns a list of all vehicle ids which departed in the previous time step.
      Returns:
      a list of vehicle ids.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if departed vehicles couldn't be retrieved

    • getTrafficLightGroupIds

      public List<String> getTrafficLightGroupIds() throws InternalFederateException
      Returns a list of ids of all traffic light groups existing in the simulation scenario.
      Returns:
      a list of ids of all traffic light groups.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if traffic light groups couldn't be read

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle(String vehicleId, String routeId, String vehicleType, String laneId, String departPos, String departSpeed) throws InternalFederateException
      Adds an vehicle to the simulation.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - the id of the vehicle. Must not be assigned to another vehicle
      vehicleType - the vehicle type. Must be existing
      routeId - the id of the route for the vehicle. Must be existing
      laneId - the lane the vehicle should be inserted on
      departPos - the position along the starting edge the vehicle should be inserted on
      departSpeed - the speed at which the vehicle should depart.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if the vehicle couldn't be added

    • subscribeForVehicle

      public void subscribeForVehicle(String vehicleId, long start, long end) throws InternalFederateException
      Subscribes for the given vehicle. It will then be included in the VehicleUpdates result of simulateStep.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - the id of the vehicle. Must be known to the simulation
      start - the time [ns] the subscription should start
      end - the time [ns] the subscription should end
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if it wasn't possible to subscribe for the wanted vehicle

    • subscribeForVehiclesWithinFieldOfVision

      public void subscribeForVehiclesWithinFieldOfVision(String vehicleId, long start, long end, double range, double openingAngle) throws InternalFederateException
      Creates a contextual subscription which returns all vehicles surrounding the specified vehicle filtered by a field of vision (sight distance and opening angle).
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - the id of the vehicle to subscribe the data of surrounding vehicles
      start - the time [ns] the subscription should start
      end - the time [ns] the subscription should end
      range - the range of the field of vision [m]
      openingAngle - the opening angle of the field of vision [deg]
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if it was not possible to create a context subscription

    • subscribeForInductionLoop

      public final void subscribeForInductionLoop(String inductionLoopId, long start, long end) throws InternalFederateException
      Subscribes to the given induction loop. It will then be included in the InductionLoopData result of simulateStep.
      Parameters:
      inductionLoopId - the id of the induction loop. Must be known to the simulation
      start - the time [ns] the subscription should start
      end - the time [ns] the subscription should end
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if it wasn't possible to subscribe for the wanted induction loop

    • subscribeForLaneArea

      public final void subscribeForLaneArea(String laneAreaId, long start, long end) throws InternalFederateException
      Subscribes to the given lane area. It will then be included in the LANEAREAData result of simulateStep.
      Parameters:
      laneAreaId - the laneId of the lane area. Must be known to the simulation
      start - the time [ns] the subscription should start
      end - the time [ns] the subscription should end
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if it wasn't possible to subscribe for the wanted lane area

    • subscribeForTrafficLight

      public void subscribeForTrafficLight(String trafficLightGroupId, long start, long end) throws InternalFederateException
      Subscribes for the given traffic light group. It will then be included in the list of TrafficLightUpdate result of simulateStep.
      Parameters:
      trafficLightGroupId - the id of a traffic light group. Must be known to the simulation
      start - the time [ns] the subscription should start
      end - the time [ns] the subscription should end
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if it wasn't possible to subscribe for the wanted traffic light group

    • setLaneAllowedVehicles

      public final void setLaneAllowedVehicles(String laneId, List<String> allowedVClasses) throws InternalFederateException
      Changes the set of allowed vehicles of the chosen Lane.
      Parameters:
      laneId - the id of the lane. Must be known to the simulation
      allowedVClasses - classes for which the lane should be opened
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if changing the set of allowed vehicles for the chosen lane couldn't be done

    • setLaneDisallowedVehicles

      public final void setLaneDisallowedVehicles(String laneId, List<String> disallowedVClasses) throws InternalFederateException
      Changes the set of disallowed vehicles of the chosen Lane.
      Parameters:
      laneId - the id of the lane. Must be known to the simulation
      disallowedVClasses - classes for which the lane should be closed
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if changing the set of disallowed vehicles for the chosen lane couldn't be done

    • setLaneMaxSpeed

      public final void setLaneMaxSpeed(String laneId, double maxSpeed) throws InternalFederateException
      Changes the allowed maximum speed for the chosen Lane.
      Parameters:
      laneId - the id of the lane. Must be known to the simulation
      maxSpeed - the maximum speed to set in m/s
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if changing the allowed maximum speed for the wanted lane wasn't possible

    • getLengthOfLane

      public final double getLengthOfLane(String laneId) throws InternalFederateException
      Gets length of a lane on an edge.
      Parameters:
      laneId - The id of the lane. Must be known to the simulation.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if the length of the wanted lane on the wanted edge couldn't be retrieved

    • getShapeOfLane

      public final List<Position> getShapeOfLane(String laneId) throws InternalFederateException
      Gets the shape of a lane, which is used for extracting the stop-lines of lanes.
      Parameters:
      laneId - The id of the lane. Must be known to the simulation.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if the length of the wanted lane on the wanted edge couldn't be retrieved

    • configureDistanceSensors

      public void configureDistanceSensors(String vehicleId, double maximumLookahead, boolean front, boolean rear)
      Enables the calculation of distance sensor values for the given vehicle.

    • simulateUntil

      public TraciSimulationStepResult simulateUntil(long time) throws InternalFederateException
      Simulates until the given time and returns the movements of all vehicles within this simulation step.
      Parameters:
      time - Time step.
      Returns:
      result of the simulation step.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if could not properly simulate step and read subscriptions

    • getLastKnownVehicleData

      public VehicleData getLastKnownVehicleData(String vehicleId)
      Getter for the last vehicle data.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The Id of the vehicle.
      Returns:
      The latest known vehicle data.

    • removeVehicle

      public void removeVehicle(String vehicleId, VehicleSetRemove.Reason reason) throws InternalFederateException
      This method removes vehicles from the simulation.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The Id of the vehicle.
      reason - The reason of remove.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if could not remove the wanted vehicle from the simulation
